data.title: Westminster Schools of Augusta
data.meta_description: Alumni - A Distinctly Different Educational Experience. Westminster seeks to glorify God by providing an excellent education that equips students to live extraordinary lives for Jesus Christ.
data.text:
Join Us

The Westminster Alumni Association membership includes YOU! All those who are beyond graduation age and who have attended Westminster are part of our Alumni Association. Our mission is to serve the Westminster community by maintaining lifelong friendships and fostering community support networks.

What We Do

We facilitate alumni contact in as many forums as possible including reunions, homecoming activities and life events of our graduates. The heart of our approach is local chapter events where alumni can connect in the city where they reside, whether it be in Augusta, Atlanta, Austin or Albuquerque. We also write welcome letters to graduating seniors each spring to connect them to the greater alumni community. And yes, we do help the school with fundraising for alumni donations.

Want to put your ideas into action?

We are always looking for new board members, local chapter contacts and those interested in giving back to the school financially. We also welcome ideas about the Alumni Network and Association and what we can do to make it better!

Update Your Info:

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScah5hDP1hvJzybXySfSezMTOlXWuw55cqsz2Lt_UsUoFc-Ug/viewform?PN=Alumni

Links to follow on social media or even have social media feed

Rahkeem George

Alumni Coordinator

alumni@wsa.net
